# Spirit (Domain)
## Overview
| **Deities:** | *Asgardian:* |  |
|---|---|---|
| | *Eberron:* |  |
| | *Golarion:* |  |
| | *Greyhawk:* |  |
| | *Kalamar:* |  |
| | *Krynn:* |  |
| | *Olympian:* |  |
| | *Other:* |  |
| | *Pharaonic:* |  |
| | *Toril:* |  |

**Granted Power:** Your ranged and melee attacks deal damage normally to incorporeal and ethereal creatures while you are on the Material Plane.

**Spirit Domain Spells**

**1 Detect Life:** Reveals living creatures within 60 ft.

   **[[Life Sense (Spell)|Life Sense]]****:** You can sense the presence of life forces.

**2 Soul Scourge:** –2 penalty to Wis, Wis-based skills, and Will saves; –4 AC against touch attack spells.

**3 Subdue Spirit <sup>F</sup>**: As *antimagic shell*, but one creature.

**4** **[[Magic Jar (Spell)|Magic Jar]]** **<sup>F</sup>:** Enables possession of another creature.

**5 Ghostwalk:** You become incorporeal.

**6** **[[Etherealness (Arm_ShldSpcAb)|Etherealness]]****:** Travel to [[Ethereal Plane]] with companions.

**7 False Soul:** Duplicate soul controls soulless body and confounds spells.

**8** **[[Astral Projection (Spell)|Astral Projection]]** **<sup>M</sup>:** Projects you and companions onto [[Astral Plane]].

**9 Consume Soul <sup>M XP</sup>:** You gain bonuses on attack rolls, saves, checks, effective level, and hps.


-tx-
|---|---|
| **Source:** | Dark Arts of Necromancy (Anubium), pg. 28 |
